ygData.subject: Joy Ride
ygData.msgSnippet: Over a valley a whisping of the wind is heard, as we close up a menasing robot is standing with both hands clutching his gun as he fires repeatedly, each blast

To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
Subject: Joy Ride
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Over a valley a whisping of the wind is heard, as we close up a menasing
robot is standing with both hands clutching his gun as he fires repeatedly,
each blast sending a current of air into the side of a mountain. Suddenly
his radio lights up and he receives Astro-Train's update. "Good work
Astro-Train. Keep our friends happy, as they seem to me they will make good
allys, over" he says in a gruff voice. Then he fires once more, smirks, and
Transforms into his truck mode and drives away. As he leaves the mountain
he has been blasting is revealed, and has been totally carved into the
Decepticon symbol through air pressure.
